message_1: What is the chemical equation for the decomposition reaction of potassium chlorate (KClO3) when heated?
message_2:
When potassium chlorate (KClO3) is heated, it decomposes into potassium chloride (KCl) and oxygen gas (O2). The balanced chemical equation for this decomposition reaction is:
